name: Easy-Breezy Nights
description: A magnificent and powerful stage structure â€” an embodiment of rhythmic fervor that stirs all who behold it to dance freely. It is a precise replica of the stage in "Tete Isle."\nIts most prominent features are its uniquely engineered acoustics and reinforced frame. The former ensures that sound waves resonate perfectly across every spot, while the latter offers rock-solid stability for even the wildest of dances. Together, they create memories of nights that remain vivid long after the music fades.
